scripts.build: rollup -c && echo "#!/usr/bin/env node \n" > build/index2.js && cat build/index.js >> build/index2.js && rm build/index.js && cp build/index2.js build/index.js && chmod +X build/index.js && chmod 777 build/index.js && rm build/index2.js
scripts.prod: yarn run build && NODE_ENV=production node build/index.js
scripts.dev: nodemon -e coffee,pug --watch "src/**/*" --exec "yarn run build && NODE_ENV=development node build/index.js"
